subject: Project Delta — Weekly status update
body:
Hello team,

Here is the weekly status update for Project Delta.
- Design: Completed
- Procurement: In progress (ETA 2025-12-05)
- Deployment: On track

Please confirm if any blockers.

Best,
Alice

subject: Meeting Invitation: Q4 Planning - Dec 2
body:
You're invited: Q4 Planning on 2025-12-02 10:00 UTC.
Please accept or propose a new time.

subject: Maritime Trends Weekly — Nov 21
body: Top stories: port congestions, fuel price outlook, technology in logistics.

subject: Congratulations! You've won a prize
body: Click here to claim your prize: http://malicious.example/claim

subject: Action Required: Update your emergency contact
body: Please update your emergency contact information by 2025-11-30 via the HR portal.

subject: Invoice #7890 due notice
body:
Dear OceanAI,
Your invoice #7890 for shipping services is due on 2025-11-30. Please advise if payment is scheduled.

subject: Scheduled maintenance: VPN outage 2025-11-26
body: Heads up: VPN maintenance on 2025-11-26 02:00-04:00 UTC. Expect brief interruptions.

subject: Please provide ETA for replacement parts
body: Can you confirm ETA for the replacement pump (part #XJ-12)? We need it for schedule planning.

subject: Cargo delay alert: Vessel MV Horizon
body: The MV Horizon is delayed due to weather. Estimated arrival shifted by 18 hours.

subject: Job Opportunity: Logistics Analyst
body: We have an open role that might interest you. Reply if you'd like to discuss.

subject: Can you review the contract draft?
body: Please review the attached contract and provide comments by 2025-11-29.

subject: Exclusive offer on fuel optimization software
body: Special pricing available for early adopters. Schedule a demo to learn more.

subject: Action: Submit weekly voyage schedule
body: Reminder: Please submit your vessel's weekly voyage schedule by 2025-11-26 09:00 UTC.

subject: Share your feedback — industry survey
body: Participate in our annual shipping trends survey.

subject: Urgent: Account verification required
body: Please verify your account at http://phish.example or access will be suspended.
